meta.title: Let's Travel Together – Accessible Journeys for Everyone
meta.description: Discover a world of travel without barriers. Connect with trained guides and plan trips with confidence, knowing your accessibility needs are prioritized from start to finish.

hero.heading: Accessible Travel for Everyone
hero.description: Plan trips, connect with guides, and travel confidently with a platform designed for accessibility at its core.

features.title: Built for Accessibility
features.description: Our platform is designed and built from the ground up to meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards, ensuring a seamless experience for screen reader and keyboard-only users.

features.title: Verified Guides
features.description: Connect with professional guides who are trained and experienced in assisting travelers with a wide range of accessibility needs.

features.title: Personalized Trip Planning
features.description: Receive travel recommendations and itineraries that are specifically tailored to your unique requirements and preferences, ensuring a comfortable journey.

trust.heading: Travel with Confidence and Peace of Mind
trust.description: Your safety and trust are our top priorities. Every guide on our platform undergoes a thorough vetting process, and our secure messaging system ensures your privacy is protected. We are committed to creating a reliable and supportive community for all travelers.

accessibility.heading: A Commitment to Inclusive Design
accessibility.description: We believe travel should be accessible to everyone. Our application is built with a deep commitment to inclusive design, ensuring that people of all abilities can navigate, plan, and book their journeys with ease and dignity. From high-contrast text to full keyboard navigation, accessibility is not an afterthought—it's our foundation.

callToAction.heading: Ready to Start Your Next Adventure?
callToAction.description: Create a free account today to explore accessible destinations, connect with guides, and begin planning a trip that is perfectly suited to you.
